checkUpkeep(bytes).details: This is the function that the Chainlink nodes will call to see if the lottery is ready to have a winner picked. The following shoulod be true in order for upkeepNeeded to be true: 1. The time interval has passed between raffle runs 2. The lottery is open 3. The contract has ETH (has players) 4. Implicitly, your subscription has LINK

returns.upkeepNeeded: - true if it's time to restart the lottery

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

setCoordinator(address).notice: Sets the VRF Coordinator addressThis method should only be callable by the coordinator or contract owner

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.

userdoc.notice: This contract is for creating a sample Raffle
